T02TD2099E:129b-1: mantra tsarya da sha ka sva bh'a bas n'a ma /
T02TD2099E:129b-3: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2099E:129b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2099E:129b-5: bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD2099E:129b-6: tha dad med par mchod par bya//
T02TD2099E:129b-7: 'gro ba rnams dang rang nyid la //
T02TD2099E:129b-8: bdag gzhan mi 'byed dus gsum gter //
T02TD2099E:129b-9: lus dang longs spyod srog rnams kyis //
T02TD2099E:129b-10: 'gro ba'i mchog gtso ba tsal bas rnyed //
T02TD2099E:129b-11: de yis dbang bsur rin po che //
T02TD2099E:129b-12: cus gsum di ni dran par byed //
T02TD2099E:129b-13: phyi dang nang gi chos spyod kun //
T02TD2099E:129b-14: gnyen po bsten pas ma yin zhing //
T02TD2099E:129b-15: dad pa'i stan las gang 'ongs pa //
T02TD2099E:129b-16: khas zas bzhin du bsten par bya //
T02TD2099E:129b-18: yang na rigs gzungs mchog gtso bor //
T02TD2099E:129b-19: byas pa'i gang yin de dag ni //
T02TD2099E:129b-20: thun bzhir bstan pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD2099E:129b-21: gal te rdzogs pa'i skal yod na //
T02TD2099E:129b-22: ye shes sku ste rab 'byung ba //
T02TD2099E:129b-23: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2099E:129b-24: ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog / bzlas brjod don dang klog pa dang //
T02TD2099E:129b-25: bya ba'i rim pa la mos na //
T02TD2099E:129b-26: rigs gzhan du ma ma yin pa'i //
T02TD2099E:129b-27: rang gi rigs la bslab par bya //
T02TD2099E:129b-28: gang zag 'o mar ldan pa dang //
T02TD2099E:129b-29: de bzhin bza' dang mthun pa'i dus //
T02TD2099E:129b-30: sangs rgyas rnams ni bsdus byas la //
T02TD2099E:129b-31: bdud rtsi myang ba bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2099E:129b-32: glu dang gar ni ji snyed dang //
T02TD2099E:129b-33: de bzhin yul la ro snyoms na //
T02TD2099E:129b-34: yul gyis bslang ba ma yin zhing //
T02TD2099E:129b-35: rang gi nyams kyis rol par bya //
T02TD2099E:129b-36: dben pa'i gnas la brten dus su //
T02TD2099E:129b-37: gtsang spra ngo tsha spyod pas min//
T02TD2099E:129b-38: dogs pa kun las grol ba'i sems //
T02TD2099E:129b-39: bsnyung dang dka' thub gnas mi bya //
T02TD2099E:129b-40: skyo dub sdug bsngal ci byung yang //
T02TD2099E:129b-41: dam pa'i drin gyis gzengs bstod de //
T02TD2099E:129b-42: yi chad sgyid lug mi 'gyur bar //
T02TD2099E:129b-43: sems dge ba la gnas par bya /
T02TD2099E:129b-44: sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas pa'i //
T02TD2099E:129b-45: sngags pa mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro //
T02TD2099E:129b-46: sngas la zhugs nas spyod pa spob //
T02TD2099E:129b-48: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa bcu pa zhes bya pa //
T02TD2099E:129b-49: dpal ldan gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02TD2099E:129b-50: rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pra dzny'a sh'i dzny'ana k'i rtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o /
